mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_db.eci_surgery_note_sync_result_server( surgeryId,batchId,syncFlag,opFlag,syncTime,cause,createTime )VALUES(#{resultId},#{batchId},#{syncFlag},#{opFlag},#{syncTime},#{cause},NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE batchId=VALUES(batchId), syncFlag=VALUES(syncFlag), opFlag=VALUES(opFlag), syncTime=VALUES(syncTime), cause=VALUES(cause), updateTime = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT t1.surgeryId AS resultId, t1.syncFlag, t1.syncTime, t1.cause FROM sc_db.eci_surgery_note_sync_result_server t1 WHERE t1.batchId =#{batchId}
